      • cambiar

        public void cambiar(boolean cambio)
        cambial el dial de la estacion A dozen modifiable push buttons (identified by integers 1 through 12) allow the listener to store and recall AM or FM frequencies. AM frequencies can be represented by multiples of 10 in the range 530 to 1610. FM frequencies are found at multiples of 0.2 in the range 87.9 to 107.9.‚Äù
        Specified by:
        cambiar in interface IRadio
